name: Total War Center Forum Sidebar Fix
description: TWC's new sidebar makes it very difficult to use the site in smaller windows. This applies a minimum-width to elements to ensure that the page content never shrinks below reasonable levels.
additional_info:
2014-09-18    initial.


*** NOTES ***

It looks like this works in Chrome and Firefox, even though userstyles.org says it won't work for Chrome without using a "To Mozilla Format" button that I could not find. All the better!
